title: Product Designer
overview: The Product Designer will advocate for the customer experience, collaborate cross-functionally, set design requirements, create concepts and deliver high-quality designs through testing and experimentation, and constantly bring new and impactful ideas to improve the design quality. They must have at least 3 years of experience as a Product Designer, familiarity with UX research, and excellent visual design skills.
